ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Wout Wagtmans, Dagmar Hanz and Adrian Schaar for their help with the preparation of the GBIF data. We gratefully acknowledge the support of the German Centre for Integrative Biodiversity Research (iDiv) Halle-Jena-Leipzig funded by the German Research Foundation (FZT 118). W.D.K. acknowledges a University of Amsterdam (UvA) starting grant. D.M.D. was supported by grants from the German Research Foundation (DE 2754/1-1) and German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD). Fieldwork in Manú was logistically supported by Perú Verde, and the Amazon Conservation Association, and conducted under the permits 041-2010-AG-DGFFS-DGEFFS, 008-2011-AG-DGFFSDGEFFS, 01-C/C-2010-SERNANP-JPNM and 01-2011-SERNANPPNM-JEF.
